Booming Voice.name: Booming Voice
descriptions: Increases the area of effect and duration of your Shouts by 10%, and reduces the rage cost by 1.
Increases the area of effect and duration of your Shouts by 20%, and reduces the rage cost by 2.
Increases the area of effect and duration of your Shouts by 30%, and reduces the rage cost by 3.
Increases the area of effect and duration of your Shouts by 40%, and reduces the rage cost by 4.
Increases the area of effect and duration of your Shouts by 50%, and reduces the rage cost by 5.

Cruelty.name: Cruelty
descriptions: Increases your chance to get a critical strike with melee weapons by 1%.
Increases your chance to get a critical strike with melee weapons by 2%.
Increases your chance to get a critical strike with melee weapons by 3%.
Increases your chance to get a critical strike with melee weapons by 4%.
Increases your chance to get a critical strike with melee weapons by 5%.

Supreme Shouts.name: Supreme Shouts
descriptions: Increases the melee attack power reduction of your Demoralizing Shout by 5%, and the melee attack power bonus of your Battle Shout by 5%.
Increases the melee attack power reduction of your Demoralizing Shout by 10%, and the melee attack power bonus of your Battle Shout by 10%.
Increases the melee attack power reduction of your Demoralizing Shout by 15%, and the melee attack power bonus of your Battle Shout by 15%.
Increases the melee attack power reduction of your Demoralizing Shout by 20%, and the melee attack power bonus of your Battle Shout by 20%.
Increases the melee attack power reduction of your Demoralizing Shout by 25%, and the melee attack power bonus of your Battle Shout by 25%.

Unbridled Wrath.name: Unbridled Wrath
descriptions: Gives you a 10% chance to generate an additional Rage point when you deal melee damage with a weapon.
Gives you a 20% chance to generate an additional Rage point when you deal melee damage with a weapon.
Gives you a 30% chance to generate an additional Rage point when you deal melee damage with a weapon.
Gives you a 40% chance to generate an additional Rage point when you deal melee damage with a weapon.
Gives you a 50% chance to generate an additional Rage point when you deal melee damage with a weapon.

Carnage.name: Carnage
descriptions: Increases the number of targets affected by your Cleave ability by 1.

Piercing Shout.name: Piercing Shout
descriptions: Causes all enemies near the warrior to be dazed, reducing movement speed by 50% for 10 seconds.

Enrage.name: Enrage
descriptions: Gives you a 5% melee damage bonus for 12 seconds up to a maximum of 12 swings after being the victim of a critical strike.
Gives you a 10% melee damage bonus for 12 seconds up to a maximum of 12 swings after being the victim of a critical strike.
Gives you a 15% melee damage bonus for 12 seconds up to a maximum of 12 swings after being the victim of a critical strike.
Gives you a 20% melee damage bonus for 12 seconds up to a maximum of 12 swings after being the victim of a critical strike.
Gives you a 25% melee damage bonus for 12 seconds up to a maximum of 12 swings after being the victim of a critical strike.

Clash of Steel.name: Clash of Steel
descriptions: Increases the damage done by your offhand weapon by 5%, and causes your successful melee attacks to reduce the cooldown of Recklessness by 1 second.
Increases the damage done by your offhand weapon by 10%, and causes your successful melee attacks to reduce the cooldown of Recklessness by 1 second.
Increases the damage done by your offhand weapon by 15%, and causes your successful melee attacks to reduce the cooldown of Recklessness by 1 second.
Increases the damage done by your offhand weapon by 20%, and causes your successful melee attacks to reduce the cooldown of Recklessness by 1 second.
Increases the damage done by your offhand weapon by 25%, and causes your successful melee attacks to reduce the cooldown of Recklessness by 1 second.

Decapitate.name: Decapitate
descriptions: Reduces the Rage cost of your Execute ability by 2.
Reduces the Rage cost of your Execute ability by 5.

Flurry.name: Flurry
descriptions: Increases your attack speed by 10% for your next 3 swings after dealing a melee critical strike.
Increases your attack speed by 15% for your next 3 swings after dealing a melee critical strike.
Increases your attack speed by 20% for your next 3 swings after dealing a melee critical strike.
Increases your attack speed by 25% for your next 3 swings after dealing a melee critical strike.
Increases your attack speed by 30% for your next 3 swings after dealing a melee critical strike.

Endless Conquest.name: Endless Conquest
descriptions: Reduces the cooldown of your Intercept ability by 10 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of your Intercept ability by 20 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of your Intercept ability by 30 sec.

Bloodthirst.name: Bloodthirst
descriptions: Instantly attack the target causing damage equal to 45% of your attack power. This attack ignores your opponent's armor.  In addition, allows 50% of your health to continue regenerating in combat.  This effect lasts 8 seconds.

Challenger.name: Challenger
descriptions: Reduces the cooldown of your Intimidating Shout ability by 15 seconds, and increases the number of targets affected by 5.
Reduces the cooldown of your Intimidating Shout ability by 30 seconds, and increases the number of targets affected by 10.

Rampage.name: Rampage
descriptions: The Berserker Rage ability will generate 10 rage when used.
The Berserker Rage ability will generate 20 rage when used.

Blood Craze.name: Blood Craze
descriptions: Gives the Warrior a 33% chance to regenerate 1% of their total health after dealing a critical strike.
Gives the Warrior a 66% chance to regenerate 1% of their total health after dealing a critical strike.
Gives the Warrior a 100% chance to regenerate 1% of their total health after dealing a critical strike.

Death Wish.name: Death Wish
descriptions: When activated, increases your physical damage by 20% and makes you immune to Fear effects, but lowers your armor and all resistances by 20%.  Lasts 30 seconds.
